text: Yannick Reine (born 12 June 1987) is a French kickboxer who has held the World Kickboxing Network lightweight title. He is a multiple time ISKA K-1 World Champion. As of July 2019 he is ranked #9 Bantamweight in the world by Combat Press.http://combatpress.com/2019/07/combat-press-kickboxing-rankings- july-2019/ ==Titles and achievements== * 2012 Elite Kickboxing France Champion * * 2013 Elite Kickboxing France Champion * * 2013 K-1 France Championhttp://usvkickboxing.com/v2/double-de-yannick-reine/ * * 2014 Elite Kickboxing France Champion * * 2016 WKN Muaythai Europe -62kg Championhttp://fr.muaythaitv.com/news/yannick-reine-champion-d-europe-wkn-en- muaythai-n5122.html#sthash.RRtlIkey.dpbs * * 2016 ISKA K-1 World -63.5kg Championhttp://fr.muaythaitv.com/news/yannick-reine-champion-du-monde- iska-n5513.html#sthash.ZWdEOGhl.dpbs (Defended 3 times) * * 2020 WKN World lightweight champion ==Kickboxing record== {| class="toccolours" width=95% style="clear:both; margin:1.5em auto; font-size:85%; text-align:center;" |- !
